misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a notable figure from Kurk Golf, brings a unique dimension to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Known for his thoughtful approach to the game, Marcus has been a consistent presence in the tournament, marking Hector Trophée 2025 as his 12th appearance.

Off the course, Marcus is known for his introspective nature, often contemplating the nuances of both golf and identity. Those close to Marcus will tell you that he sometimes participates in events under the alias of Eva.

Despite his extensive participation, Marcus is still looking for his first victory at the Hector Trophée. Observers note that his dedication and perseverance suggest that a breakthrough may be on the horizon. The golfing community watches with interest as Marcus continues to evolve both on and off the course.
